description:
ssh/terminal: add GetState and make ReadPassword work in raw mode.

GetState is useful for restoring the terminal in a signal handler.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

ssh/terminal: add GetState and make ReadPassword work in raw mode.

GetState is useful for restoring the terminal in a signal handler.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
